stages.logText: Temporary placeholder.
Level 0
Level 1
Vine taken.
Vine placed.
First corpse discovered
Second corpse discovered
Third corpse discovered
Torture signs discovered
Keyfield on Bwm29
Conversation with Ehrenfest starts before Ortholion appears.
Conversation with Ehrenfest starts after Ortholion leaves.
Ehrenfest notices your presence in the mine and calls you.
Prim's Evoker info.
Moyra's info.

Down in a hole, in the mountain side near Prim I've found signs of a heinous torture. At least three corpses were there. I felt the urge of getting out of there as far as I could and report the events to someone in the village inmediately.
A mysterious looking guy appeared on a sudden in my way to report the guards. He has recommended me not to tell them.
I ignored the advices of the strange guy that almost stumbled upon me. I must see some guards.
Somehow, a Feygard general and his men reached Prim. They are kind of extorting the people in charge to get the full control of the Elm mine.
The man in charge is not willing to hear me. They seem to have bigger problems right now. Maybe the guy I met earlier was right.
A Feygard general and two henchmen of him appeared. They must be up to no good.
Ehrenfest is uneasy. He said we must meet in Elm mine, West of prim. We should talk no more about this inside the village.
Ehrenfest told me his story, and why he knew about what I saw on the mountain side, but he didn't dare to go down the hole.
I explained to Ehrenfest the horrible scene, and showed him a proof of the torture. Poor guys...
I must ask the villagers about Lorn and his partners, maybe I can gather some useful information from the common gossip.
It seems Lorn was a regular client of the tavern. I should ask there.
